body:
Stumbled across the following CMake bug:

https://cmake.org/Bug/bug_relationship_graph.php?bug_id=15386&graph=relation

CMake Versions 3.1.2 and newer build fine with openssl 1.0.2, whereas older releases fail. I could reproduce the problem when trying to install CMake 2.8.10.2, which is listed as "safe version"

In the CMake bug report, the following patch is attached:

https://cmake.org/gitweb?p=cmake.git;a=commitdiff;h=c5d9a8283cfac15b4a5a07f18d5eb10c1f388505
title: Older CMake Releases (prior to 3.1.2) don't build with openssl 1.0.2
